item.title: Rozhin add a quote by OshO
item.description: "Intelligence is dangerous. Intelligence means you will start thinking on your own; you will start looking around on your own. You will not believe in the scriptures; you will believe only in your own experience." -- OshO

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by William Shakespeare
Rozhin add a quote by H. Jackson Brown
item.description: "Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eyes" -- H. Jackson Brown

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Don't say you don't have enough time. You have exactly the same number of hours per day that were given to Helen Keller, Pasteur, Michaelangelo, Mother Teresa, Leonardo da Vinci, Thomas Jefferson, and Albert Einstein." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "People are capable, at any time in their lives, of doing what they dream of." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "What's the world's greatest lie?... It's this: that at a certain point in our lives, we lose control of what's happening to us, and our lives become controlled by fate." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Life is an opportunity, benefit from it. Life is beauty, admire it. Life is a dream, realize it. Life is a challenge, meet it. Life is a duty, complete it. Life is a game, play it. Life is a promise, fulfill it. Life is sorrow, overcome it. Life is a song, sing it. Life is a struggle, accept it. Life is a tragedy, confront it. Life is an adventure, dare it. Life is luck, make it. Life is too precious, do not destroy it. Life is life, fight for it." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by عشق
item.description:
"عشق عشق مي آفريند عشق زندگي مي بخشد زندگي رنج به همراه دارد رنج دلشوره مي آفريند دلشوره جرات مي بخشد جرات اعتماد به همراه دارد اعتماد اميد مي آفريند اميد زندگي مي بجشد و زندگي عشق مي آفريند عشق عشق مي آفريند
احمد شاملو" -- عشق

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by احمد شاملو
item.description: "کوه از نخستین سنگ آغاز می شود و انسان از نخستین درد" -- احمد شاملو

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Rozhin add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "A loving heart is the truest wisdom." -- Charles Dickens
